The app seems not to have your permission to use bluetooth

Ensure that on selected target device %1$s
  • bluetooth is turned on
  • this device is (still) listed as paired device
  • %2$s is running
Mirroring score on this device to other device (or vice versa) via bluetooth not possible.
App %s turned on bluetooth. Turning off bluetooth now…
Bluetooth needs to be turned on to be able to mirror screen on other device.

You need to pair this device with another device running %1$s to be able to mirror the scoreboard screen. Typically this is done by performing steps along the way of:
  • on both devices, open the bluetooth settings screen
  • ensure that on the target device
    • bluetooth is turned \'On\'
    • the device is (temporary) visible to other devices
  • on this device select \'Pair new device\'
  • the target device should show up under \'Available Devices\': select it
  • Confirm the pairing on both devices
